resources.string: Enable ADB over bluetooth and \"always allow computer\"

How To:
Enable Developer Options and enable "ADB debugging" and "Debug over Bluetooth".
Request permission and press "Allow" or "Always allow this Computer".
Now ADB debugging can be turned off, on reboot the proxy will remain.

Use at your own risk.
Requesting permission.\n\Works best with WiFi turned OFF.
Write secure settings permission needed. ADB over Bluetooth can be used.
ADB over Bluetooth is enabled, request permission!
Permission granted,\nADB can be turned off.

Not powerful enough... you will need a PC.

Make sure to connect your watch to your PC via ADB. Use the command

adb shell pm grant marsdroid.me.wearproxy android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

to give WearProxy the permissions needed to turn activate and edit the proxy.

To turn off use command:

adb shell settings delete global http_proxy; adb shell settings delete global global_http_proxy_host; adb shell settings delete global global_http_proxy_port; adb shell settings delete global global_http_proxy_exclusion_list; adb shell settings delete global global_proxy_pac_url; adb shell reboot
Requesting permission or turning off not working?
